description: This file defines a TemplateService class that interfaces with an API to manage templates, including CRUD operations, rendering, validation, testing, and importing/exporting templates. It centralizes template-related API calls for a web application's frontend.

classes.name: TemplateService
classes.description: A class providing methods to interact with backend API endpoints for managing templates, including CRUD operations, rendering, validation, testing, and import/export functionalities.

methods.name: getTemplates
methods.description: Fetches a paginated list of templates with optional search parameters.

methods.name: getTemplate
methods.description: Retrieves a specific template by its ID.

methods.name: createTemplate
methods.description: Creates a new template with given data.

methods.name: updateTemplate
methods.description: Updates an existing template identified by ID.

methods.name: renderTemplate
methods.description: Renders the template with provided variables.

methods.name: validateTemplate
methods.description: Validates the syntax and correctness of a template.

methods.name: testTemplate
methods.description: Tests a template with a specific test case.

methods.name: runAllTests
methods.description: Runs all test cases associated with a template.

methods.name: getTemplatesByVendor
methods.description: Retrieves templates associated with a specific vendor.

methods.name: getTemplatesByDevice
methods.description: Retrieves templates associated with a specific device type.

methods.name: cloneTemplate
methods.description: Clones an existing template with a new name.

methods.name: exportTemplate
methods.description: Exports a template as a file blob.

methods.name: importTemplate
methods.description: Imports a template from a file.

methods.name: getTemplateVariables
methods.description: Retrieves variables defined in a template.

methods.name: addTestCase
methods.description: Adds a new test case to a template.

methods.name: updateTestCase
methods.description: Updates an existing test case within a template.

methods.name: deleteTestCase
methods.description: Deletes a specific test case from a template.
